document_data.name: Tavern of the Garden Wine
document_data.mainbody: '''Tavern of the Garden wine''' was an aptly named variety of red [[wine]] from [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.Description: Tavern of the Garden wine was a quality red wine with a strong and rich flavor. Each bottle was valued at ten [[gold]] [[coin|pieces]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Tavern of the Garden wine was created by a vinery owned by the Morden family of Ravens Bluff. The wine was a house red sold at the newly-reopened [[Tavern of the Garden]], a tavern and eatery in the [[Sixstar]] neighborhood, run by [[Shauna Morden]] who inherited the business from her late father. Shauna was stocked on good vintage and offered a case as a reward to a group of adventurers.{{Cite organized play/LC/Before Its Time|5}}
